title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the PeerLearningNetwork platform, including user stories, functional and non-functional requirements, and any constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any necessary integrations or third-party services. Consider the following aspects: 

1. Scalability: The platform should be able to handle a growing number of users and content without compromising performance.

2. Modularity: The architecture should be modular, with clear separation of concerns and well-defined interfaces between components.

3. Security: Implement appropriate security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.

4. Maintainability: The codebase should be well-organized, documented, and follow best practices for maintainability.

5. Integration: Identify any necessary integrations with existing systems or third-party services (e.g., authentication, notifications, content management).

6. Data Storage: Determine the appropriate database solution(s) based on the data requirements and access patterns.

7. Caching: Explore caching strategies to improve performance and reduce load on the database.

8. Monitoring and Logging: Incorporate mechanisms for monitoring system health, performance, and logging for debugging and auditing purposes.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the platform, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and any necessary tools or frameworks.

title: Implement Backend
description: Implement the backend components of the platform, including APIs, business logic, and any necessary integrations or third-party services.

title: Implement Frontend
description: Implement the frontend components of the platform, including the user interface, user experience, and any necessary integrations with the backend.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and any necessary data migrations or seeding.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including user registration, login, and role-based access control.

title: Implement Peer Learning and Knowledge Sharing Features
description: Implement the core features of the platform, including peer-to-peer learning, knowledge sharing, and any necessary collaboration or communication tools.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Set up the testing and quality assurance processes, including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and any necessary test automation frameworks or tools.

title: Implement Monitoring and Logging
description: Implement monitoring and logging mechanisms for the platform, including error handling, performance monitoring, and any necessary alerting or reporting tools.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Prepare documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer guides, and any necessary technical or architectural documentation.

title: Deploy and Release
description: Deploy and release the platform to the production environment, including any necessary configuration, data migrations, or infrastructure provisioning.
dependencies: Implement Peer Learning and Knowledge Sharing Features
Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
